description: Test cases for viewing and interacting with session details

test_cases.name: Display Session Detail Information
test_cases.expected_result: Screen displays: sport type, time, players needed, visibility (public/private), host info

test_cases.name: Display Host Information
preconditions: User is on Session Detail screen

test_cases.name: Display Joined Players Avatars
test_cases.expected_result: Avatars of joined players displayed (e.g., AL, MK, SJ)

test_cases.name: Display Session Status
preconditions: User is on Session Detail screen
test_cases.expected_result: Status shows 'Pending' with joined count (e.g., '2/4 joined')

test_cases.name: Display Session Description
preconditions: User is on Session Detail screen
test_cases.expected_result: Session description text displayed (e.g., 'Friendly game. Bring your own shuttlecocks...')

test_cases.name: Join Session
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Player Join confirmation screen

test_cases.name: Maybe Interest Button
test_cases.expected_result: User can express tentative interest, navigated to propose or interest tracking

test_cases.name: Open Session Chat
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Session Chat screen

test_cases.name: Back to Lobby
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Session Lobby screen

test_cases.name: Suggest Venue and Book (Host)
preconditions: User is host on Session Detail
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Venue Suggestions screen

test_cases.name: Join Session When Full
test_cases.expected_result: Join button disabled or error message indicating session is full
